attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hydrogenated fat has been linked to many diseases such as heart disease and altzimers.
This fat is banned in many european countries and in the USA.
I believe that in future it will have an adverse effect on our children and on the NHS.
People buy products containing these type of fats for their children completely unaware of the health problems related to it.
Please ban this substance NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
